theme-version: "1.0"

glow-color-hover: "rgba(255, 105, 180, 0.4)"
glow-color-active: "rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.4)"

label-active-sub: "Nyan nyan nyan~"

---

# Nyan Cat Theme

The classic internet meme - a pixelated cat with a Pop-Tart body flying through space leaving a rainbow trail.

## Preview

This theme features:
- Animated Nyan Cat sprite on progress bars
- Twinkling star background on progress track
- Rainbow gradient fills
- Pink accent colors throughout
- Space/night sky dark theme

## Credits

- Nyan Cat by PRguitarman (Christopher Torres)
- Original meme from 2011
